Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth every penny. Considering its value to you, I am offering it to you today for $75. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a special discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
